resources.string: The app needs your permission to read the phone state and send sms messages to the recipient to tell him/her how long it takes you to arrive.
Please enable the location services. Otherwise the app has no means of detecting your current location and cannot estimate arrival times.
If you go back the app will no longer monitor your position and send status updates. Do you want to go back?
Remaining distance: %%DISTANCE%%. Duration: %%DURATION%%. Last updated on %%LASTCHECK%%.
I have arrived at %%DESTINATION%%.\n\nSent by ETA: https://goo.gl/bPqq17
I am now on my way to %%DESTINATION%%. I will probably arrive in %%DURATION%%, at %%ARRIVAL%%.\n\nSent by ETA: https://goo.gl/bPqq17
I am still on my way to %%DESTINATION%%. I\'ll be there in about %%DURATION%%, at %%ARRIVAL%%.
My arrival time has changed. I\'ll be there in about %%DURATION%%, at %%ARRIVAL%%.
Location services are required for the autocompletion of places.
I am almost at the destination. My remaining time is %%DURATION%%, I\'ll be arriving at aroung %%ARRIVAL%%.
Do you want to finish this trip and inform your contact that you have arrived?
I have arrived at the destination.
The Google API Client could connect to the remote party. Are you online?
The app needs to access your location in order to compute the time it takes to reach your destination. The app is useless if you do not grant this permission.

Some manufactures require that apps ask for the permission to read contacts in order to show a contact picker. Since the list of devices is changing rapidly the permission is asked for on every device. The app will not read your entire address book nor will it send any contact information to an external server.
Removes all destinations that you have selected in the past.
Record debug information in external log file.
Default setting for sending sms at trip start.
Default setting for sending sms updates during the trip.
Default setting for sending sms update when the destination is almost reached.
Default setting for sending sms when the destination is arrived.
The app will keep the display active until toggled of manually.
The app will no longer keep the display active.
Send an email to the developer.
You have to enter a phone number and a destination to start a trip.
You need an active internet connection to use this app.
Encountered an error while trying to compute a route to your destination. It is likely unknown or too far away to be reached within reasonable time.
The app has encountered an uncatched error. Please send an email containg the error details to the developer.
